text: “Nang inhalpui mi inkhat in nang chungnga zootmak ah chongtanna munna anaruoi inchu, lamma ningsi lai innot ah inzootnaru, kha emak inchu ni-inhalpui ama'n nangkha chongkatanpa diang khan napeta, halli chongkatanpa in nangkha mikhumna kangaak ngaidiang napeta nang mikhumna khan nadasik eii.”
